articles.author: Jennifer Gray, CNN meteorologist
articles.title: A named tropical system is likely by Labor Day. Here's how it could affect weekend plans
articles.description: The National Hurricane Center is actively watching four areas right now for tropical development, and two have a decent shot of affecting the US on Labor Day weekend.

articles.title: Video: People stranded by Pakistan floods rescued using bedframe - CNN Video
articles.description: Severe rain and floods have killed more than 1,000 people in Pakistan since mid-June, according to the country's national disaster management authority.

articles.title: Video: How Ukrainians are dealing with the sorrows of war - CNN Video
articles.description: In Bucha, they are now forced to bury the dead with numbers, not names. Six months into this brutal war, Ukrainians are reeling from the impact of past horrors and bracing for new ones.

articles.author: Oleksandra Ochman, Kostan Nechyporenko, Hira Humayun, Darya Tarasova and Michelle Velez, CNN
articles.title: IAEA to visit Zaporizhia nuclear plant 'in next few days,' as Ukraine officials hand out iodine pills
articles.description: International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) inspectors are expected to go to the Russian-held Zaporizhzhia power plant later this week, as the city's authorities made iodine pills available to residents due to fears over a possible nuclear accident.

articles.title: Ukrainian forces begin 'shaping' battlefield for counteroffensive, senior US officials say
articles.description: Ukrainian forces have begun "shaping" operations in southern Ukraine to prepare the battlefield for a significant Ukrainian counteroffensive, two senior US officials briefed on the intelligence told CNN.

articles.author: Clare Sebastian
articles.title: 'Slower burn.' Russia dodges economic collapse but the decline has started
articles.description: Six months after invading Ukraine, Russia is bogged down in a war of attrition it didn't anticipate but it is having success on another front — its oil-dependent economy is in a deep recession but proving far more resilient than expected.
